name: Spooky Arena
description:
It's a lazy Tuesday afternoon. In your rush to get to work you left the TV on. In the midst of your 9 to 5 desk job you miss the horrors of daytime television as well as something a bit less horrifying:

The TV flashes to static and from it footage of ghosts battling for their lives appear. This is the Spooky Arena.

Shoot, weave, and spook your way through diverse levels plagued with ghosts (who are probably just minimum wage interns trying to get something on their portfolio) as you make your way from this commercialized bastardization of purgatory.

UPDATE v1.02:

  • Originally when you tried hitting escape on the death screen the game would open up a browser and start playing  Taylor Dayne's 1988 Grammy Award Winning single "Tell It To My Heart", this was caused by an oversight which I refuse to elaborate on and has been fixed.
  • Minor bug fixes
  • Gameplay stability
